# Tongi

## Overview

Tongi is a city north of Dhaka, part of the Gazipur district and Greater Dhaka area.

## Key Facts

- **Country**: Bangladesh
- **Founded**: 1964 AD
- **Elevation**: 10 meters
- **Area**: 34 kmÂ²

## Notable Features

Tongi hosts the annual Bishwa Ijtema, one of the world's largest Islamic congregations after Hajj.
